title: Think about the purpose of the analysis
text: Consider what the analysis aims to achieve. Is it simply to understand past data, or to predict or prescribe future actions?

title: Analyze The Example
text: The example given is about working with existing data to understand past events. What type of analysis focuses on summarizing or interpreting past data trends?

title: Identify The Correct Term
text: What term describes the process of analyzing past data to summarize or describe what has happened?
